text: Pogonocherus marcoi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Sama in 1993. It is known from Italy. It feeds on Pinus pinea.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus marcoi. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1993
title: Pogonocherus marcoi
